Speaker: ﻿PROLOGUE
Text: HAYABUSA VILLAGE, JAPAN

[We see a classic Japanese house and a helicopter next to it. The owner of the house is standing on the veranda and looks at his garden. In the house we see two people – a man and a woman dressed in strict suits. Man passes the business card to the owner of the house.]

Speaker: Man
Text: Call me Ishigami.

Speaker: Host
Text: Ministry of Defense, External Affairs?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: A special agency within the Ministry. Think of us like you ninja.

Speaker: Host
Text: And…?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: She will provide you with the details.

Speaker: Woman
Text: Mizuki McCloud. Japan Air Self-Defense Force Special Security Unit, Flight Officer First Class. Yesterday… an unknown group launched a terrorist attack in London. They’ve taken control of the area around the Prime Minister’s residence.

Speaker: Host
Text: So why me? What do you need my help for?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Oh no. We don’t need your help. You need ours. Mizuki, show him the video.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: This was just sent to us by the government.
[In the video, we see terrorists killing civilians, politicians taken as hostages and the footage from previous Ninja Gaiden games.]

Speaker: Unknown voice from video
Text: BRING US RYU HAYABUSA! BRING US RYU HAYABUSA!

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: It’s you they want, Ryu Hayabusa.
[The name of the game appears.]

Speaker: NINJA GAIDEN 3
Text: RAZOR’S EDGE

[In the next scene we move to London. The camera is flying over Big Ben, and on the tower itself we see our hero, Ryu Hayabusa, dressed in a classic suit from the previous games. He is looking at the city with his trademark steel gaze and arms crossed over this chest. Mizuki talks to him over the radio.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa, can you hear me?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Yeah. Go ahead.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: All civilians have been evacuated. Any armed soldiers down there are fair game.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: The hostages are in the Prime Minister’s residence, right?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Yes. I’ll monitor the situation and guide you from the air.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …Be careful, Hayabusa.

Speaker: DAY 1
Text: LONDON, UK
[Ryu leaps stylishly from Big Ben, dodges the rockets, lands and starts slashing the terrorists. When he comes to the truck that blocking the road, he hears Mizuki over the radio.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …Wait! Somethings there!
[A huge robot appears and releases several rockets. Everything explodes. Ryu retreats, followed by several terrorists.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: They’re after you. Find some place to hide! Hayabusa! Get out of there! There’s an alley nearby! Hurry! Looks like you get rid of it. We can’t do anything with that thing around.
[Ryu goes into a small alley, but it ends in a dead end.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Dead end… You have to find another route.
[Ryu does his trademark somersault with jumping off the walls and climbs onto the roof.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Nice work, ninja.
[Ryu goes further, stepping on the corpses of many soldiers. After a while he stumbles across a large and well-fortified group of enemies.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: We’ll disorient your enemies from the helicopter. Deal with them while they’re out of it!

Speaker: Helicopter pilot
Text: Humming 1, beginning operation. We’re out! Now it’s up to you, ninja.
[Ryu enters a cloud of smoke. He moves slowly, evading laser sights and killing terrorists from the back.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: This smoke should give you cover from its sensors.
[Suddenly Mizuki notices something.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Getting thermal readings from inside the smoke!
[A huge robot appears.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Get out of there. Hayabusa! Regroup!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: No. I can take this thing down.
[Ryu chops off one of the robot’s legs.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: With just a sword… Amazing…
[Ryu chops off the second leg.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I can’t believe it’s still moving…
[Ryu chops off a few more legs and the robot falls, exposing his generator.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: The generator’s exposed! Take it out!
[Ryu pierces the generator and the robot explodes. One of the pieces of it breaks through the jammed passage.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Amazing… Such power…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’m heading for the residence.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Roger.
[Ryu goes on. After a while, he comes to dead end again.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Watch out! They’re on the roof!
[Ryu climbs onto the wall, killing those who are above with shurikens and goes on.]
[Ryu finds the door on the roof and goes down the stairs.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Do you know where the hostages are being held?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: No. We can’t monitor anything inside the residence. Watch yourself, Hayabusa.
[Ryu come down and finds blood spots on the wall.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Damn…

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa, what’s wrong?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …There’s blood.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Are the hostages already…?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …I’m going on.
[Ryu goes on until he comes out into the yard. He sees the traces of blood leading to the white door and knocks it out.]

Speaker: Hostage
Text: Please, help!
[A stranger in a red robe and white mask kills a hostage.]

Speaker: Masked Stranger
Text: I’ve been waiting for you, hero.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Who are you?

Speaker: Masked Stranger
Text: Let’s dispense with the introductions and get straight to the killing, shall we? Come, Ryu Hayabusa!
[Ryu wins and pierces the stranger with his sword. On the last gasp the stranger reads some kind of spell.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What…?

Speaker: Masked Stranger
Text: Open your eyes, Ryu Hayabusa.
[Ryu notices that his Dragon Sword disappeared.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: The Dragon Sword.
[Swirls of blood fly around Ryu and soak into his hand, making it crimson-red.]

Speaker: Masked Stranger
Text: So. How does it feel to suffer as all your victims?
[Ryu tries to attack the stranger with his sword, but without success.]

Speaker: Masked Stranger
Text: No, no! We are both steeped in the blood of our countless victims my brother… Farewell until we meet again.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Damn you…!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa! Hayabusa, respond! Hayabusa!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’m fine.
[Ryu hardly gets to his feet and starts walking slowly.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Listen. Radar has picked up a missile incoming. One minute to impact. You need to get out of there! There’s got to be a way out somewhere… Hurry up or you won’t make it!
[In the building where Ryu fought with the stranger, several missiles fly in. Everything explodes.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa!

Speaker: Old Man
Text: How disappointing. I had hoped the mighty Dragon Ninja would put on more of a show. No matter…. Begin the next phase.

Speaker: Soldier
Text: Yes, sir.
[We see a large capsule with a huge face in it. The camera returns to the wreckage of the building where Ryu was.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …yabusa? Can you hear me? Hayabusa, come in!
[Ryu climbs out of the wreckage.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa…?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: We’re coming to pick you up.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Good.
[We see Ryu on the ship and realize that he managed to get out.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I owe you one.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Don’t worry about it. What matter now is…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What’s the situation?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: The soldiers withdrew once the residence was destroyed. It appears you really were their objective.

Speaker: Old Man
Text: Mizuki, turn on the news…
[Mizuki turns on a TV, on the screen of which we see a stranger in a mask.]

Speaker: Masked Stranger
Text: This new world has no need of nation-states. No need of avaricious, incompetent prime ministers, or presidents, or kings, or despots. Every nation, every country must immediately agree to our terms of surrender. You have seven days--exactly the number of days it took God to create the world. Failure to comply will result in your immediate destruction. We did it to London, and we can do it to you.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: So this is what they were really after…
[We see an electronic map of the world. Mizuki speaks to Ryu in the background.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa, urgent call from HQ. Transmission source has been identified.
[The scene change to desert. Mizuki and Ryu are riding an SUV and talking.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: See that high-rise up ahead? It was abandoned in the middle of construction. As far as we can tell, the satellite transmission originated from that location. Then it was uploaded and distributed through hacked communication systems all around the world.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Is that even possible?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: If you had the entire world’s resources at your fingertips, maybe.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: So who are these people?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Whoever they are, they have access to some serious money. The UN has scheduled a crisis conference for today. They’ll probably order the mobilization of emergency forces. HQ has told me to provide you with whatever support you need. Looks like we’ll be working together for a while longer, Hayabusa.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: It does.
[Mizuki stops the SUV and the heroes come out.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: This is as close as we can get by car without attracting attention.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: It’s close enough.
[Mizuki takes a massive suitcase out of the trunk.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: This was developed by our own engineers. It’s still just a prototype, but…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What is it?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: It’s obviously not your Dragon Sword, now is it?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: This is a special bow that can lock on to a target. Should be for you to use it, right?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’ve used bows before.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …Okay. Good luck. Remember, I’ll be watching your back.
[Ryu goes down the sand dunes and the game continues.]

Speaker: DAY 2
Text: DESERTED CITY, RUB’ AL KHALI
[After only a few steps Ryu comes across a half-ruined city wall and several towers. On the towers we see soldiers with rocket launchers.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: They saw you!
[Ryu uses his bow to shoot the soldiers. After that Mizuki hears a strange sound.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: What’s that sound?
[A few soldiers on motorcycles appear. Ryu kills them, then a sand storm strikes, in the center of which we see a girl with purple hair wrapped in a cloak.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: It’s been a while, Master Ryu.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Ayane?

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Hayate asked me to come.
[Ayane gives Ryu a beautiful, but quite standard-looking Japanese sword.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: The Jinran-Maru. Word gets around fast.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Make sure you bring it back in one piece. It’s just a loaner.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Okay… Tell Hayate I said thanks.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: You should have someone in the village take a look at that arm.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I will. Soon. There’s something I need to finish first.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Take care.
[Ayane disappears the way she appeared. Ryu continues his mission.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: How did she know about this place? It’s classified top secret.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Ninja have their ways.
[After a while Ryu gets into an ambush.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: You’re cut off!
[Ryu kills the opponents and goes on.]
[Ryu stumbles upon a small precipice.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Can you get over there?
[Ryu runs around it over the wall without any problem.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I keep forgetting you’re a ninja.
[Ryu goes further, making his way through a series of fierce battles. Eventually he meets a helicopter, and, after a short fight, our hero falls into a hole in the wall of one of the buildings.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: You okay, Hayabusa?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’m in the dome. Where should I go?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I lost your coordinates in the last explosion. But the dome should have a monorail that links to the tower. Be careful.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I will.
[Ryu comes across a helicopter again. After a short fight, the helicopter is out of ammo.]

Speaker: Chopper’s pilot
Text: That’s the last one. Missiles out! Reload!
[Ryu goes on.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: That’s the monorail station ahead. The intel we have says the dome is still being powered by its solar generator. Even though it’s been abandoned for two years… The source of the signal is above you. You should be able to take the elevator to the top floor. If it’s still working, anyway…
[Ryu goes in the elevator.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa, are you there? Come in! Are you okay, Hayabusa? What’s going on?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’m heading up…

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: The source is straight up ahead.
[Ryu go up to the roof of the building. After a small amount of acrobatics and a couple of opponents, he climbs onto the platform where he again meets the Regent of the Mask.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Aah. Good. You still live, Ryu Hayabusa. Quite a fast response today… By Japanese government standards, anyway. Unfortunately for you, we’re all done here.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Who are you?

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Ah. An alchemist. Born again in the here and now.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What do you mean?

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Magnificent, isn’t it? A skyscraper abandoned in the middle of construction. Like the Tower of Babel, built so high they incurred the wrath of God. What better backdrop for the beginning of the end of the world?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’m tired of your nonsense.

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: You lack a sense of aesthetics, my friend. After all, doesn’t the art of your country teach you to appreciate austerity and elegance of decay? And speaking of decay… how is your arm? It’s an old Slavic curse, you know. The Grip of Murder, they call it.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: The Grip of Murder?

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: All material things pulse to their own frequency. The words of the curse resonated with the blade of your Dragon Sword. broke down its structure, then melted into your arm, together with all the malice and hate it encapsulated. It was a simple spell to weave.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Malice and hate?

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Think, think. How many lives has that hand taken? Hundreds? Thousands? The blood of those you have cut down infused your sword, together with their vengeful hatred… And now it is in your arm. Perhaps you can hear their sorrowful wails? Well, soon those cries will begin to rot your arm, from the inside out. The infection will spread to the rest of your body, and that will be the end of you. Death will follow shortly. The only real question is, who will die first. You or the world?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Damn you!

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Do you really want to know who I am? I’m the same as you, Ryu Hayabusa. We’re cut from the same cloth. Look at your right hand. That is the symbol of all the lives you have taken, all the people you have killed. Make no mistake. You are an assassin of the darkness.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Enough! A mirage?

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: In the ruins of paradise where the corpses of dreams lie rotting, that could more befitting than a mirage? Yes, of course I am an illusion. As is all existence, nothing more than a collection of data point resonating in infinite expansion. But enough. The time for talk is at an end. War and strife is your fate, death and duty. Or am I wrong?
[A combat helicopter appears and a fight begins. Ryu tries to hit him with the bow.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Your arrows can’t pierce it!
[After a while Ryu manages to climb the helicopter and destroy its guns. The helicopter loses control, Ryu clings to him using his kunai.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hang on just a little more! Just until the altitude goes down! The wings…!
[The helicopter falls and crashes.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa! Are you okay Hayabusa?!
[We see Ryu aboard the Yunagi - it seems he was able to survive again. He talks to Mizuki and it seems we caught the heroes in the midst of the conversation.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: It has exploding tip that’ll blow up anything it hits.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Tell me something.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Sure.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Are you using me to test all of your prototypes?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: N-no! It’s just that I thought… Well, there’s this guy in our lab who’s a bit mad, and he…

Speaker: Man
Text: A bit mad? You don’t mean me, do you?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: If there were any others like you, this world would be in even more trouble than It already is.
[A little girl and a guy come into the room.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Canna?! What are you doing here!? You were supposed to be looking after her!

Speaker: Man
Text: Orders. Ishigami told me to come.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: He didn’t order you to bring Canna along, did he? Didn’t I tell you to stay at home and wait for me to come back? It’s not safe for you here. You have to wait in a safe place until Mommy gets home, do you hear me?

Speaker: Man
Text: She said she didn’t want to be alone anymore. And besides, with this maniac on the loose, no place is safe. She’s better off with us.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …What’s done is done. You’re here now.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Is she your…?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I guess an introduction are in order. Hayabusa, this is my daughter, Canna. It’s all right, Canna. You don’t have to be afraid of him. He may look kind of scary, but he’s a good man.

Speaker: Canna
Text: I’m not scary.
[Ryu leans over to Canna and takes off the mask. There’s a smile on his face.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Hello, Canna. My name is Ryu. That means dragon.
[Canna is hiding behind Mizuki.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Canna, don’t be so rude. I’m sorry, Hayabusa.
[Ryu seems upset.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: No, no. It’s okay. I’m sorry for scaring her.

Speaker: Man
Text: Er, ahem? Perhaps you could introduce me?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Oh, right, Hayabusa, this is Clifford Higgins, a scientist with the Ground Self-Defense Forces Special Research Unit.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: That’s all?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Why else is there?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Such love for her dearest brother-in-law… Anyway! Hello. Call me Cliff. Your legend precedes you, you know.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Nothing but stories.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Perhaps, perhaps not. In any case, it’s a pleasure to meet you, Hayabusa! So, to business, shall we? We have identified the group behind the threat.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: You have?!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Yes. They’re called the Lords of Alchemy. You actually know them better by their global conglomerate front: LOA.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: LOA?!

Speaker: DAY 2
Text: PARIS (AYANE]

[We see how Paris is flooded with military. A small group of soldiers enters the SPA salon, where Ayane is resting. She receives a message with the text "5 seconds." Ayane sighs. The soldiers enter the salon. While she is chopping down on the soldiers, a girl contacts with her.]
Sorry to ruin your vacation, but we need you, Ayane.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: I’m not doing this for free, Irene.

Speaker: Irene
Text: The government declared their opposition to the Regent of the Mask. They acted way faster than we thought they would…

Speaker: Ayane
Text: …It’s good we got in before they could.
[Ayane climbs onto the roof.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: They’re heading for the Presidential Residence. The resistance won’t out for much longer. You have to hurry!
[Ayane jumps off the roof and walks on, killing the soldiers.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: This whole area is under their control. Be careful.
[Ayane goes on.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: So much for taking it easy in Paris.

Speaker: Irene
Text: Clean this up, and they’ll probably give you a VIP vacation next time your in town.
[She goes forward until stumbles upon the Black Spider Ninja Clan.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Black Spider Ninjas…? What are they doing here?

Speaker: Irene
Text: Seems like they’re working for the terrorists.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Guess this is what happens when you lose your leader…
[Ayane kills Black Spider Ninjas.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: Nice work ninja. You sure don’t fight like a little girl.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Who are you calling a little girl?!
[Ayane goes on until he runs into an ambush.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: What a pain…
[Ayane is getting to the president’s residence.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Okay. I made it.

Speaker: Irene
Text: This is it. Good luck.
[Ayane is attacked by many soldiers. She complains in the midst of the battle.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Dammit…! How many are there…?

Speaker: Irene
Text: Looks like reinforcements are on the way! Watch out!

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Yeah, now this is getting fun…!
[Ayane kills all the soldiers.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Looks like that’s the last of them.
Well, well… I come to see what all the fuss is about and look who I run into.
Such a darling little heroine…

Speaker: Ayane
Text: This is as far as you go. Prepare to die.
Heh heh heh… Breaking in, killing… You’ve been naughty. Time for your punishment, girl!
[The battle begins. Irene contacts Ayane to cheer her up.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: Don’t let him get to you. You can do this!

Speaker: Ayane
Text: I know! So shut up and let me fight!
[She defeats all of them.]
Now it ends…

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Don’t even try to act all tough…

Speaker: Communicator
Text: Warning. Missile strike commencing. Time until impact…
May the unclean world… be purified…!

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Irene!

Speaker: Irene
Text: Looks like I got them in time!

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Seriously… You wanna try NOT waiting until the last second to do that…? So--

Speaker: Irene
Text: I hacked their transmission codes and got control of the communication satellite they were using.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: So I didn’t really have to worry about death from above or whatever. I guess I’m done here, right?

Speaker: Irene
Text: Now we’re going to find out who these people really are. Ryu’s trying to figure that out too, but in his condition… You’re the only one I can count on.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Alright, fine… You can use me a little longer.
[Ryu sits on the plane. Mizuki contacts him on the radio.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Arriving at objective.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’m goin in.
[Ryu jumps out of the airplane through the cargo bay. In flight, he dodges missiles, cuts down the missile launcher upon landing, and kills the crowd of soldiers guarding it.]

Speaker: DAY 3
Text: ABISMO ISLAND, INDIAN OCEAN

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Impressive. Crazy. But impressive.
[Ryu goes further, fighting with soldiers and the local fauna.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: We gotta be careful. Who knows what kind of stuff is waiting for us out here.
[Ryu kills several dogs.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: It’s a patrol. Get in the shadows!
[Ryu knocks out the door and kills the guard of the checkpoint. As he exits, he hears a voice on the radio.]

Speaker: Radio
Text: Transport team request immediate assistance.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hm? I can hear something.

Speaker: Radio
Text: Jungle patrol, come in.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: A radio. But where is it?

Speaker: Radio
Text: Is this radio broken? Come in! Com in! This is the transport team. Respond.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Can you jump onto that truck?
[He jumps on the truck.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Looks like he didn’t notice.

Speaker: Radio
Text: Whatever. I’m leavin’.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Don’t get caught. I’m going offline.
[Moving back to the base. Mizuki’s talking to Clifford.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: LOA… The ‘toothbrushes to the tanks’ guys?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: The one and only. They used to be your average massive high tech conglomerate, but ever since the economic crush and resulting industry take down they diversified into manufacturing… well, anything and everything. After analyzing the weapons we seized, we realized they’d been secretly developed by LOA. No question about it. In fact is, if you’ve got technology, money, and you’re pretty much invincible. It’s always been that way… What I could do with the tiniest fraction of LOA’s budget…

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Look at all these offices and affiliates. LOA has global reach. If anyone could control the mass media, it’s them. So that means they could be behind this. The only question is, why?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Don’t ask me. That’s your job.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Mizuki. I need you and Hayabusa on Abismo Island at once.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: We think this is the location of LOA’s secret lab. We don’t have much of a window. Get going.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Understood. LOA…

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Hey. Listen. Watch your back with Ishigami. He’s hiding something.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Like what?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: This operation isn’t sanctioned be any government. This is his little project. He’s off the grid.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: No.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Yes. The Americans know you and Hayabusa are on the move. And let’s just say they aren’t happy about it. Something’s not right about this mission.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Understood, Cliff. But regardless, we still have to check LOA out. I’m going.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: OK. Just be careful out there.
[Mizuki comes to her daughter, Canna.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Mommy has some work to take care of. I’ll be back soon, okay? You listen to Cliff while I’m away.
[They hug.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Take care of her for me, Cliff.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: You got it. And this time, I won’t let her out of my sight. Promise.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Let’s go, Hayabusa.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Okay.
[Mizuki leaves. Canna grabs Ryu’s hand.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What is it?
[Canna shows Ryu her phone on which is written in Japanese "Mama-o mamotte" - "Protect my mommy".]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Of course. Her and you both. I promise, Canna.
[Mizuki returns.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: C’mon, Hayabusa.
[Ryu and Mizuki leave. The frame changes and we see that Ishigami watched them all this time.]
[We return to Ryu, hanging on the truck. The truck drives to the base.]

Speaker: Soldier 1
Text: What the…?! Back of the truck! The ninja!

Speaker: Soldier 2
Text: Damn… Burn the truck!

Speaker: Soldier 3
Text: R-roger! Fire!
[Ryu jumps off a damaged truck and start the carnage. After a while, the soldiers retreat.]

Speaker: Soldier 1
Text: Leave it to Airborne! All units fall back!

Speaker: Soldier 2
Text: Fall back! FALL BACK!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …busa? Can you hear me? …heading your way! Wait! That sounds like a…! Incoming! Get the hell out of there! That’s an incendiary round! It’ll burn the whole area! Get out of there! Hurry!
[Ryu dodges the missiles and jumps into the wide ravine, where he fights with the boss-helicopter and wins.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Mizuki, come in. I took care of the helicopter.

[Ryu goes farther, making his way through a small cave with narrow passages, where he’s confronted by soldiers and the local fauna. After getting out of the cave, Ryu gets in the underground military base where he is happily greeted by the ninja soldiers with whom Ryu is cruelly straightened out. Getting on to the surface, Ryu calls Mizuki.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’m at the lab. Can you hear me, Mizuki?
[Mizuki does not answer and Ryu continues to follow the mission. Ryu points to the banks with small dinosaurs.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Aah! Fast as ever. You ninja are nothing if not punctual.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You again. Now I know LOA is up to something. Tell me about dinosaurs.
[Ryu points to the jars with small dinosaurs.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Aah. Clones from fossil cells.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Why?

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Why? Business, of course. How many children would want a dinosaur as a pet? We could sell millions of the things. And! The technology represents something even the richest man can’t buy. Think about the potential of cloned organs. Or cloned young bodies.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You’re out of your mind.

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Am I? Well, there’s always another application. I see you like my little watchdog. I really must apologize for forgetting to leave out a "beware of dog" sign.
[A huge dinosaur, resembling a tyrannosaur appears and the fight begins. Ryu wins.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Well done. As I would expect from a Dragon Ninja. Where you go, bodies lie in your wake.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: And you will join them.

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Ah, ah, ah.
[Several soldiers lead Mizuki in handcuffs.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa! I’m sorry…

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Drop your sword, ninja.
[Ryu takes out his sword and throws it to the ground.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Smart move, Hayabusa. Now…
[Ryu instantly raises his sword and kills soldiers guarding Mizuki.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Well, well! Not bad. Sudden death is a ninja specialty, after all.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Are you okay?
[Mizuki nods.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: And now for you.
[Mizuki takes out her gun and points it to Ryu.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Mizuki?!
[We hear a knock of the heart. The screen is darkened and we hear a shot.]
[We see Ryu lying in darkness.]
I thought you’d never wake up, Ryu Hayabusa.
[Ryu moves to a beautiful field.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: My name is Lovelace, and I’m in charge of the Abismo Laboratories. We shoot you with enough tranquilizer to bring down a dinosaur, you know. You’re indeed an impressive specimen.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: That is this place?

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Welcome to our virtual simulation environment. We would appreciate your cooperation for a few moments.
[The scene changes and Ryu gets to the bridge with heavy car traffic.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I won’t help you.

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: I’m afraid you don’t have any choice.
[Everything around freezes.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: In this simulated space, we convert quantum oscillations into real-time tracing and reconstruction of physical objects.

[Lovelace snaps his fingers and the scene changes to a baseball field. Ryu catches a baseball ball that flies unexpectedly. The ball dissolves in his hands, and then the scene changes back to the bridge.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: In other words, this space is just like real world. You can be hurt here… and you can die.
[Right after her words, one of the cars heads straight for Ryu. The machine loses control, flies into the wall and explodes.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Expensive toy.

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: I have your friend with me. The woman who shoot you, and her daughter.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …You’re dead.

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: If this all goes well, you might even get to see them again. So, shall we begin to test?

[The scene changes on the roof of the airship. It is a hint of Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 and its third mission - Skies of Vengeance. Lovelace disappears. The scene is filled with thunder and lightning. Ryu continues to hear her voice, rolling and deep, like she was the goddess of this world.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: I’ve been waiting for this moment. Now show me. Show me what a Master Ninja can do.
[Ryu is fighting with a lot of ninjas.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: You’re the work of art, ninja. The power of the dragon courses through you…
[Ryu again kills all the enemies.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Phase one complete. Well done. Let’s change the stage.
[Ryu jumps from the blimp straight to the balcony of the first mission of Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 - Sky City Tokyo, where he fights with one of the bosses.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: I suspect you remember this.
[Ryu kills all enemies.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Phase two complete. Curious as to there you’ll go next?
[Upon entering the building, where he first met the Regent of the Mask.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Doesn’t this make you a little nostalgic?
[Ryu walks up to the hawk and saves his progress.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Aah, to be a bird, flying free. But you, my little falcon, will not leave this cage.
[Ryu encountered Regent of the Mask once again.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Masks… They allow one to play the role by hiding one’s true face. Your mask is no different. Hero? Or murderer? Which is the true face of Ryu Hayabusa?
[Ryu fights the Regent and again throws him out the window. Ryu jumps after him, but instead of continuing the fight, he breaks out of the simulation.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: An impressive feet, Ryu Hayabusa. The machines you destroyed was no cheap, you know? I never have enough lab rats…
[Ryu quickly moves around the collapsing laboratory. After a while, he runs into the soldiers.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: The lab rat is loose. Subdue it. Quickly. You’re cleared to use lethal force! It cannot be allowed to reach GC07!

Speaker: DAY 4
Text: LOA BIOLAB, ABYSMO ISLAND
[Ryu kills enemies and goes on.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: There is no way out for you, ninja! Lab rat sighted. All units, secure bridge 6!
[After Ryu kills all the enemies on the bridge, it suddenly starts to open.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Heh heh… Looks like you’ve nowhere to run, yes?
[Ryu glides smoothly over the bridge and jumps to the other side. He climbs using his kunai, and goes on until he runs into some office space.]

Speaker: Soldier
Text: What’s going on in there? What do you mean, “ninja”? We killed him at the bridge!
[Ryu brutalizes the soldiers and goes on.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Still alive? You have resilience of a cockroach.
[After defeating the enemies.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Your friends are up ahead, Ryu Hayabusa.
[Ryu enters the room, the doors close behind him.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: We trapped the rat. Open the capsule! Open it at once!
[Capsules with humanoid creatures opens.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Now, to continue the experiment…
[Ryu defeat all the creatures.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Where are Canna and Mizuki?’

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: This time we’ll get serious.
[Out of nowhere a variety monsters appears.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Isn’t it just wonderful?
[Ryu fights the monsters.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: More than wonderful, wouldn’t you say, Ryu Hayabusa? But playtime is over.
[The floor under Ryu is opens up, and he falls in some kind of green slime.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Goodbye, Ryu Hayabusa.
[Ryu continue fighting monsters.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: My children have been so lonely… Play with them as long as you can hold out.
[Ryu kill the enemies and goes upstairs.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Thank you for the data… And the wonderful stimulation. Now you will melt away into oblivion…
[Ryu climbs into the sewer pipe.]

Speaker: Computer
Text: Emergency. Emergency. Level 4 Situation in Lab Area 7. All researchers, please evacuate to upper levels.
[Ryu goes on killing crowds of monsters. After a while he hears Lovelace’s voice again.]

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Surviving patrol units, report to elevator hall! Protect the lowest level at all cost! "At all costs." You understand what that means? What’s going on? What’s wrong with the chimera…? Are they reacting to the dragon blood? Huh. Incredible… Ryu Hayabusa…? No matter how many times I try to destroy you, you come back… How? Do you see this horror…? Perhaps this too is your doing…
[Ryu goes on. After a while he comes across a laboratory from which a wounded scientist comes out.]

Speaker: Scientist
Text: Hahh… Hahh… Managed to stop the blood… You-you’re the ninja…!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: It’s dangerous here. You should run.

Speaker: Scientist
Text: Did you come for the girl?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Scientist
Text: …Okay. I have access to the elevator. I’ll you down to the lowest level.
[Ryu descends on the elevator along with the scientist.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Why are you doing this?

Speaker: Scientist
Text: Hah. Don’t look a gift-horse in the mouth… I have a little girl. About her age. Or she was, last time I saw her… After I let you off, I’m going back to her.
[Ryu and the scientist come out of the elevator. The scientist shows the way.]

Speaker: Scientist
Text: It’s through this hall… Right…
[Suddenly, out of the blue, some soldiers appears and kill the scientist.]

Speaker: Soldier
Text: You… traitor…
[The battle starts. Ryu punches through the crowds of soldiers, finally ends up falling into bloody madness.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Canna, are you all right? You’re safe now. Where’s Cliff?
[Canna shrugs.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: And Mizuki?
[Canna type the answer on her phone: "She was taken by a terrifying woman".]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …That woman. Let’s go find your mother. Canna. Listen. Close your eyes. Don’t look at anything. Don’t listen to anything. You shut everything out.
[Ryu takes Canna in his arms and leaves with her.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Where are you taking me?

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: You don’t need to know.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Where is Canna?

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Move! Now!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Is Canna okay? If you’ve done anything to her…

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: Shut up and walk.
[Lovelace takes Mizuki with her. Ryu with Canna in his hands make his way through a long corridor with monsters, killing them with a single rapid strikes.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Be still.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Close your eyes.
[Going further, Ryu enters a strange room with a huge vessel inside, in which some bulbous creature floats.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What is this…?

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: The egg of a god.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What?!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Canna!
[Mizuki breaks away from the Regent and runs to Canna. She hugs her.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I was so worried about you! I’m so sorry. They had Canna… I had no choice…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: It’s fine.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What do you want?

Speaker: Lovelace
Text: The modern alchemist makes the dreams of gods come true. I wish to see the birth of a new world. We took a little sample of your blood, while you were sleeping. A dash of your dragon DNA. You are all descended from the dragon god, are you not? While not in this prototype here, It will prove a most useful ingredient when the time comes to give birth to a new god…

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: You know, I think you might add something to the mix as well.
[Regent of the Mask pushes Lovelace into the vessel.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Goodbye.
[Lovelace turns into a monster and breaks the vessel.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: What the hell?!

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Behold, the prototype of a god. It is… imperfect. Born of a warped heart, it stands before you incomplete, less than whole. Yet even so, it is far mightier than a mere man.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Take Canna.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa?!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Go!
[The battle with mutated Lovelace begins.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Well now, shall we glimpse the power of a god?
[After Ryu chop off the front hands, the creature turns it into some kind of tentacles.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: Heheh… Our little prototype seems quite attached to the chimera…
[Ryu chops off the hands of the creature again after that it screams and leave.]

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: I’ve enjoyed this clowning around, but it’s time to leave. The two of you enjoy yourselves. We’ll meet again, I suspect. Ha ha ha!
[Regent of the Mask leaves and Ryu starts chasing the mutated Lovelace. Finding her in the next room, he kills her and hears the warning system.]

Speaker: Computer
Text: Self-destruct system activated. All units. Please evacuate all areas.
[Everything starts to explode and Ryu quickly leaves the lab. After reaching the elevator, he meets Canna and Mizuki, and they all leave the lab. On the surface they stumbled upon armed soldiers.]

Speaker: Soldier
Text: You’re coming with us, Ryu Hayabusa. You too, Ms. McCloud.
[Ryu and Mizuki are on board the US aircraft carrier, there they being lectured by some military officer.]
What the hell do you think you’re doing? You trying to be a hero? We’ve made inquiries with your government, and they denied any and all involvement your activities.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I’m acting minder the orders and authorization of the Japanese Ministry of Defense, External Affairs…
We tried to find this Ishigami who you claim was running the op. No one knows where he is.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: But the group was calling for Hayabusa! Back in London…

You are not the UN! You two don’t get to go running around trying to solve the world’s problems!Your actions are a direct affront to the sovereignty of other nations. That is a very serious offense. You will cease this operation. Immediately. You so-called ninja are ghosts of a forgotten age. These are different times, with different rules. You don’t belong here.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: But what about the threat…?
Enough! Now, as long as we understand each other, you may go. We’re rendezvousing with a vessel which will take you back to Japan. That is all. You’re dismissed. I said, you are dismissed!
[Changing scene. Ryu stands on deck and looks at the ocean.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I’m sorry about this. About everything…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: It’s not your fault.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: But what happened to Ishigami? I can’t get in touch with him. Cliff even tried to warn me. I hope Cliff is safe.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Listen. you can’t give up hope. You have to be strong for Canna.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …I know. The truth is, Canna isn’t my real daughter. My sister married Cliff’s brother and, well, Canna’s their child.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Canna doesn’t talk much…

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: There was an accident. My sister and her husband were killed. It was a shock to her. Both parents, just gone. So I took her in. It’s been oven a year now.
[Canna runs up to them.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Canna? What’s up? You getting hungry?
[Canna shows Ryu her phone, it says "Be my dad."]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: C-Canna! You mustn’t ask people things like that! Oh, what am I going to do with you? We’re sorry. We’re very, very sorry.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: No, no. I just… never thought of being a father… I’m touched.

Speaker: Soldier
Text: Hey, you! Your ride’s here.
[The soldier points to the incoming ship, and we see Clifford on it. He waves the heroes.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Cliff?! I’m so glad you’re okay!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: I was in the hold when we were attacked. I just kept hidden in there. How’s Canna?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: She’s fine.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: I’m sorry. I know I promised…

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: It doesn’t matter. You’re both safe. That’s all I care about.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Did you hear anything about Ishigami?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: No. It was just like you said.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: So what do we do now?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: First we need to get home and request backup. HQ might have news about Ishigami. At any rate we can’t do anything else here.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: I wonder what those Yanks are up to. Whatever it is, it doesn’t make any sense. Something’s up.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa, what about you?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I must return to my village. I… I need to look into something.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Then it’s settled. I’ll get a chopper to take us back to Japan, ASAP.
[Ryu is getting ready to fly away.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Be careful, Hayabusa.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’ll be back soon.
[In the helicopter, Ryu’s tormented by his bloody hand again. He signals the pilot.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Here.

[He jumps out of the helicopter and goes to the ninja cemetery. He finds Genshin’s sword, touching it and recalls their last battle. Ryu takes the sword from the ground and performs several swing strokes.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: This one time, I will borrow your soul, lord of the dark ninja.

Speaker: DAY 5
Text: HAYABUSA VILLAGE, JAPAN

[Ryu fights his way to his village, killing a lot of ninjas, and in the end again falls into a bloody madness, overcoming which he hardly has strength left, but he still continues to stubbornly go to the village, at first slowly, and then completely crawling. Having reached the entrance to the village, the forces finally leave him and Ryu falls down. He awakes in bed, as from a nightmare. Momiji sits next to him.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Master Ryu, you must not move.
[Momiji heals Ryu with a glowing amulet - Dragon’s Eye, which we saw in the second installment of the game. A boy runs into the room.]

Speaker: Boy
Text: Master Ryu. Please get better soon so you can start training us again!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I feel much better already, Sanji.

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Sanji is the one, who found you, Master Ryu.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: So you saved me. Don’t let it go to your head.
[The boy runs away, but Ryu calls him.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Sanji! I’ll train with you anytime you want.

Speaker: Sanji
Text: Yes!

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Master Joe is waiting in hermitage outside the village. We should go together.
[We return to the game. Ryu walks through the village with a walking step until he runs into one of the ninja village guards.]

Speaker: Ninja
Text: Are you okay?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Sorry for scaring you. I’m fine.
[Ryu goes on.]

Speaker: Ninja
Text: Thanks the gods.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You can thank Sanji for that.
[Ryu comes to a woman teaching another ninjas archery.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Omitsu.

Speaker: Omitsu
Text: Master Ryu! I’m so happy you’re okay. I worked on you bow… Here.
[Omitsu passes Ryu his bow. Ryu inspects it.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Thanks.

Speaker: Omitsu
Text: It’s nothing. That’s a very strange bow, though.
[Ryu goes to the target practice range.]

Speaker: Omitsu
Text: Here, watch closely.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Looks like you did a good job.
[Ryu goes on.]

Speaker: Ninja
Text: Master Ryu, may you have victory in battle.
[Ryu goes on.]

Speaker: Old man
Text: Master Ryu… Are you going to see your father?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Old man
Text: It seems the Black Spider Clan is planning something again. You can leave the village to me. Me and the young ones can use the training.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Thanks, Genjiro.
[Ryu goes on. Suddenly, Sanji jumps out of the ambush.]

Speaker: Sanji
Text: Gotcha.
[Ryu easily repulsed his attack.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Keep practicing.

Speaker: Sanji
Text: Heheh… I don’t think I’ll ever beat you… I’m looking forward to our training.
[Sanji leaves, and Ryu goes further, moving to his normal speed. He reaches the grave of Kureha and starts praying. Suddenly, someone is calling him from behind.]
Master Ryu.

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Thanks for waiting. Let’s go.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Okay.
[Ryu and Momiji are running together.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: This way.
[They are attacked by several ninjas. Heroes easily deal with them.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Master Ryu, you’re amazing!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: As are you, Momiji.
[Heroes go further and again come across opponents and defeat them.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: We must hurry.
[After passing on the heroes come across a web blocking the path.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Leave it to me.

[Momiji uses a fiery technique to burn off the barrier. The heroes go further, reaching the vast arena. They battle with a lot of the Black Spider’s ninjas, and in the midst of the fight, Momiji turns to Ryu.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Master Ryu, look! Is this… Soul-Summoning?
Heh heh heh… Call forth a hell of perpetual slaughter!

Speaker: Momiji
Text: That voice… It’s Obaba!

Speaker: Obaba
Text: Ah ha ha ha! Two new morsels have fallen into my web… Prepare to meet your fate! Get them! Our hatred of the Dragon Ninja Clan… Rend his flesh from his bones! Kill him! Rip them to pieces!
[Heroes continue to fight with more and more opponents.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: They just don’t stop!
[Momiji uses the technique and burns the squad of the Black Spider. Suddenly a huge hand emerges from the ground and grabs the heroes.]

Speaker: Obaba
Text: Foul servants of the dragon, hear me! Now you shall feel the vengeance of the Black Spider Clan! Kah, kah, kah! I will crush you like bugs!
[Obaba tries to crush Ryu, but he breaks away.]

Speaker: Obaba
Text: Humph… Very well, then. The maiden shall die first!
[Ryu runs on the huge body of Obaba, killing the Black Spider ninjas and breaking the barrier obstructing the path.]

Speaker: Obaba
Text: Heheh, who will die first…?

Speaker: Momiji
Text: It hurts…
[When Ryu cuts the outgrowth, Obaba screams and throws Ryu away. He makes a wobble in the air and flies to Obaba, clutching at her hand.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Momiji! Are you okay?

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Yes! I’ll take her from this side!

Speaker: Obaba
Text: You are finished, Dragon Ninja!
[Obaba tries to crush Ryu. He cuts the outgrowth and flies to the next one, which he cuts together with Momiji, after which both jump off and begin to fight the Black Spider ninjas.]

Speaker: Obaba
Text: Foul heir of the Dragons!
[Heroes defeat all ninjas and attack the outgrowth. Meanwhile, Obaba is preparing to shoot them with a ray from her mouth.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Master Ryu! Now!

[Momiji activates the defensive field and does not let Obaba hurt her, but a tentacle hits her. Heroes continue to fight the ninjas, and after a while, Ryu finishes the outgrowth. Obaba screams and tries to drop the heroes. Momiji and Ryu go down to the raised hand to Obaba’s head, but Momiji flies away and Ryu attacks the crystal on Obaba’s forehead and finishes her. The fire in his legs fades, Ryu hawks from the falling corpse of Obaba and manages to catch Momiji, who almost touched the ground. He cries her on his hands to some house on among the swamps.]

Speaker: Host
Text: Ahh, Ryu.
[We learn that the owner of the house is Ryu’s father - Joe Hayabusa. He has blindfold on his eyes, as he became blind after the fight with Genshin in the second game.]

Speaker: Joe
Text: …The way the curse pulses tells me it has infested your entire body.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: How do I get rid of it?

Speaker: Joe
Text: I do not know. Long ago, there was a dragon ninja afflicted by a similar curse. In the end, he was swallowed by the darkness. Only his Dragon Sword remained. The Dragon Sword was a gift, meant to be used to slay the Archfiend. But it became polluted by the souls of its countless victims. The sorcery cast upon you has cursed that pollution to fester and be absorbed into your very body. The curse of the Dragon sword is the karmic retribution for all the deeds committed by the Dragon Clan over this countless generations.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: There are still things I have to do.

Speaker: Joe
Text: It’s not an easy thing., to live in the darkness. But there are times when we must face the darkness, and overcome it. Or else…
[Ryu returns to the aircraft carrier. We see the room in which Ryu, Clifford and Mizuki discussing the plan for further actions.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: I have an idea. I’ve been looking into LOA in all sorts of ways. Some legal, some not.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: You better watch it. The end doesn’t justify the means.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: So sue me. Come on. The facts are the facts. LOA has build some sort of secret facility in the middle of Antarctica. Talk about suspicious. That must be their base of operations.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Are you sure?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Give me a little credit. You’re talking serious brainpower here. So that do you think?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Well, we don’t have any other leads.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: So that are we waiting for? I’ll arrange the jet.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Right. There isn’t much time. You know, you’d better wait with Canna here on the ship. You can’t take here where we’re going.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: So who’s going in as backup?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Me. Sorry. I can’t be Canna’s surrogate parent forever. This time, you stay with her.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: But…!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: I’m a better backup for this op, anyway. Come on, I want to play the hero here. So let me.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Fine. We’d better get you geared up, then.
[To Canna.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: You stay here with Hayabusa. I’ll be right back.
[Mizuki and Clifford leaves. Canna runs up to Ryu and hands him a paper shuriken.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What’s this?
[Canna shows her phone to Ryu again. It’s says: “Mommy taught me. You’re really a ninja, so it’s perfect.”]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Thanks, Canna. I feel safer with this.
[Canna grabs Ryu’s hand. Ryu places his hand above hers.]
[We see Ryu and Clifford sitting on the plane. They land hard on the icy ground.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Hayabusa. The cave entrance is ahead.
[Clifford opens the door of the plane. A stream of icy air comes out from the open door.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: You can use it to get inside their base.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Got it.
[The game starts. Clifford continues to talk with Ryu over the radio.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Hey, can you hear me?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Yeah…

Speaker: DAY 6
Text: HOWARD PHILLIPS PLAINS, ANTARCTICA

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Don’t you ever get cold in that get-up, Hayabusa?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: No.
[Ryu is attacked by several ninjas in red.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Looks like you have been spotted, mate. I really don’t get you guys. Nasty weather today. It was beautiful up until yesterday. Speaking of which, why did they build their facility in a place like this? Total white-out now, though. You’d better be careful, in this visibility.
[Ryu continues to walk through a thick white mist until he encounters a new group of enemies.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: There’s more. Quite the welcoming party. Looks like there are… One… Two, three… Lots of hostiles!
[Ryu uses his upgraded bow to kill some enemies.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Is that some new model? Pretty slick. Watch it, Hayabusa! You’re on a crevasse! Watch out! Avalanche!
[Part of the mountain on which Ryu fought is split and he jumps from one piece of rock to another, reaches a sheer wall and climbs it.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: I figured as much. Been meaning to ask… Can you hear me?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …I can hear you fine.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Your objective is inside. Good luck.
[Ryu starts to explore the ice cave and break through the crowds until he finds a huge door. When Ryu opens it, we return to the aircraft carrier to Mizuki. She works at the computer.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Canna? Canna, are you okay?
[Mizuki goes looking for Canna. When she enters her room, she finds a mess.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: How many times have I told you to clean up after yourself when you’re done playing?
[Mizuki tries to call Canna, but her phone is lying on the floor.]

[We return to Ryu, who passing through the door and finds himself in some kind of mansion. Going through it and kills many enemies, he finds a room where he meets… himself. After winning a fierce battle, he sees Clifford.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: I knew you have it in you, Hayabusa.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Not even the ties of blood can stop you from taking a life.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Why are you here?

Speaker: Old man
Text: Allow me… to answer that.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Who are you?

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: Pleased to meet you. I’m the chairman of LOA. You may call me Ashtear. And this is my head of R&D, Clifford Higgins.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Sure I was a contract scientist for the Japanese government, but my true calling is research for the Lords of Alchemy.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: So you behind all of this.

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: And you’ve proven to be our biggest obstacle, Dragon Ninja. You were supposed to have died in London.

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: But I stayed our hand when Clifford said he needed a sample of your blood.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: You should thank me, Hayabusa. I saved your life… for a little while at least. And thanks to the Dragon Ninja’s DNA, we are even closer to creating a perfect being. A magnificent addition to our bloodline.

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: You see, I am Clifford’s grandfather. Canna’s great-grandfather. She is a very special girl. I need her.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What about Mizuki? Is she alive?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Who cares?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You son of a…
[Ryu wants to get his sword, but Ashtear stops her with his magic. Then he resurrects Ryu’s twin.]

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: You and your monster brother can kill each other. The death of the Dragon clan and its outdated ways will mark a birth of a new millennium!
[Ryu again fights his double at the limit of his abilities and skills. After defeating him, the laboratory begins to crumble.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: This facility is going to collapse. Surviving ninja evacuate immediately.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: C’mon, live! For Canna’s sake!

[Ryu gets out of the lab on the way fighting the desperate ninjas. After Ryu gets to the surface, he encounters a large helicopter with Ashtear and Clifford in it. They use the helicopter weapons to kill Ryu.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: You’re dead! You just never give up!

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: Humph. Knock him off!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: No. no… one moment, grandfather.

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: Very well. Go ahead. You have no more use of him, correct?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Coming! …Bye, bye.
[Clifford is trying to shoot Ryu with rockets, but he jumps off the helicopter.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Still alive, Hayabusa?
[The mountain on which Ryu is stood, begins to collapse and he, jumping from one piece of rock to another, climbs onto the wall.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Hey, hey! Careful. You can’t die on me just yet. Only a little way to go. I’ll be waiting on the Black Narwhal.
[Ryu climbs the mountain. He sees a helicopter and blurred images of several people in a white mist in front of him.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Hayabusa! Over here! Let’s go. They are abandoning this base which means we don’t have much time.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: How did you…?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Come on. We gotta hurry, before the whole world is goes to hell.
[A rainy night. Several soldiers run into the port warehouse.]

Speaker: Soldier
Text: Come on. Come on. Move!
[We see Ayane standing on a huge crane. Suddenly, out of blue, a massive ship appears.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: The cloaking’s down. This is it.
[The soldiers spots Ayane.]

Speaker: Soldier
Text: Ah! There she is! Go on! Get over there!
[Ayane jumps off the crane, fly to the port warehouse and start killing. Irene is talking to her over the radio.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: The target is called the “Black Narwhal”… It’s a classified carrier created by the Pentagon for special ops.

Speaker: DAY 6
Text: MARITIME FACILITY, U.S.A. (AYANE]

Speaker: Irene
Text: The contractor that won the manufacturing bid was Genesis Dynamics. They’re actually a front for LOA military operations. It’s in dock right now, ready to ship out any time.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: So, you want me to get to that ship, right?

Speaker: Irene
Text: You’re such a smart kid.
[Ayane continue to explore the warehouse and killing soldiers.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: You see all the people around there. They’re all LOA mercenaries.
[Ayane kill all soldiers at the gate and climbs on it.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: Alright, you’re through the firs gate. Looks like you’ve got a nice welcome party.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Yeah, whatever…
[Ayane goes on until she comes across two big monsters.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Gross… That the hell are these things?

Speaker: Irene
Text: LOA biological weapons. A product of their alchemy.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Hmph. I don’t think me and alchemist would get along.
[Ayane continues to explore. Couple of dozens killed soldiers later she comes across two fiends.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Fiends…! Irene!

Speaker: Irene
Text: Looks like LOA were researching fiends as well. Their next generation of weapons…

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Gross… They’re perfect for the Black Spider Ninjas.
[Ayane goes further, climbs on another crane and jumps from it to the “Black Narwhal”. Shredded all fiends on its deck to pieces, she encounters a new type of enemies.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: These things just keep getting more disgusting!

Speaker: Irene
Text: …You don’t have much time!

Speaker: Ayane
Text: No shit!
[After killing three new enemies that turn out to be bosses, Ayane hears a loud screech.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: It’s going to dive. Get out of there! Any longer and you won’t make it back! Move! You’ve done enough. Now get out of…
[Ayane turns off the radio and dive with the ship. A minute later Irene with GPS tracker runs up to the port.]

Speaker: Irene
Text: No way…

Speaker: Ayane
Text: I can’t tell if you are just watching us to keep us in check, or if you actually, like, give a damn. A GPS transmitter. A little much for this operation, isn’t it?
[We see how Ayane throws the transmitter into the ship’s hold.]

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Are you always going to be chasing us down?

Speaker: Irene
Text: The CIA is concerned. You aren’t allies or enemies. You’re ninja, and you’re too dangerous.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: That about you?

Speaker: Irene
Text: I just… you know… I just want to help Ryu.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Okay, whatever… You’ll just keep chasing the rest of us…

Speaker: Irene
Text: Sorry… Ryu’s the only one I’m after.

Speaker: Ayane
Text: Seriously! What’s with you and Ryu!

Speaker: Irene
Text: I know him better, than you do, kid.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Is Mizuki safe?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Yes. She’s already working on a plan to rescue Canna.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Who do you work for? What’s you role in all this, Ishigami?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: My role…? Aren’t I the hero? Look. I was as much in the dark as everyone at first. The orders that sent you and Mizuki to London came from above. The enemy had managed to infiltrate our upper ranks. I figured there might be some connections between Cliff and LOA, but I couldn’t figure out what they wanted. That’s when I went to ground.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You expect me to believe that?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: I don’t care that you believe. I did that I thought was right at the time. Why else do you think I came to the ends of the earth to pick you up? The problem is Canna.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Canna?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: It doesn’t make sense. Why would Cliff go to the trouble of bringing her to the Yunagi? If he wanted to kidnap her, it would have been easier to do back in Japan.
[Ryu remembering the words of Ashtear: “She is a very special girl. I need her.”]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: They may have wanted to get you two together for a some reason.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Canna and me?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: In any case, we have to go after them. They are on the Black Narwhal, of the US Navy 1st Fleet.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What are you talking about?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: In 1973, the original 1st Fleet was absorbed by into the 3rd Fleet. However, the US government secretly reinstated it as a special, off-the-books “ghost fleet”. A fleet that isn’t supposed to exist. A mirage… Hayabusa, Mizuki and her sister Saya’s father was a colleague and good friend of mine… I owe him debts that cannot be repaid. I have duty to protect his family. That was the promise I made to him. Help me.

Speaker: Radist
Text: Sir! A message from Langley! The Black Narwhal has been sighted in waters near French Polynesia.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Langley? Why the CIA?

Speaker: Radist
Text: The signature’s just one word: Seaswallow.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Seaswallow?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Sound familiar, Hayabusa?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …We can trust it.

Speaker: Radist 2
Text: But the South Pacific is too far. You’ll never get there in time!

Speaker: Radist 3
Text: Not even at max speed…?

Speaker: Radist 2
Text: The crushing speed of the F-25 is Mach 2. Distance is 4000 km. Not enough fuel range. And there aren’t any intermediate airfields between here and there to refuel.

Speaker: Radist 4
Text: That about carriers? Are there any crossing the slight path?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: No, there are no friendly ships within range. Not even a wake trail.

Speaker: Radist 3
Text: Even if we could rendezvous with another plane, without a place to land…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: There is a way…

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: What did you say?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I said, there’s a way…
[Camera switches to somewhere else. We see several flying jets.]

Speaker: Jet’s Pilot
Text: We’re almost at bingo fuel. Where the hell are they…? Visual acquired. Here they come.
[Another jet flies up the first one. On the second seat of the first jet we see Ryu.]

Speaker: Jet’s Pilot
Text: You sure you wanna do this?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Yes.

Speaker: Jet’s Pilot
Text: You gotta be crazy to try and jump between jets in midair! I ain’t helping you kill yourself!
[Another jet flies under the first one.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: NOW!

Speaker: Jet’s Pilot
Text: Fine, whatever!
[Ryu jump off the jet. When he flies up to the another jet, he is met by Mizuki.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Ryu! Take my hand! Here! Quickly!
[Ryu successfully gets in the another jet.]

Speaker: Jet’s Pilot
Text: Who IS that guy?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Rendezvous successful.  Good entry. You done this before?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: First time.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Virgin flight. Nice.
[The first jet pilot takes off his helmet and put on sunglasses. We see his name of the stripe: “Robert.T.Sturgeon”.]

Speaker: Jet’s Pilot
Text: The fate of the whole goddamn world is resting on your shoulders.
[Ryu thumbs up him from his jet.]
[We see the Black Narwhal emerges from water with some aircraft carriers around him.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Look. Down there.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: So, that’s the Black Narwhal?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa?!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I-I’m fine… We got a welcoming committee!
[Every rocket launchers at the Black Narwhal is shoots at our heroes.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: It’s no good! I can’t get any closer!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Just get me above one of the escort ships! It doesn’t matter which one.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I’ll try!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: As soon as I’m down, you get out of here! FAST!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Please, Hayabusa… Find her for me!

Speaker: DAY 7
Text: THE BLACK NARWHAL, PACIFIC OCEAN
[Ryu jump off the jet. While he is flying, Ishigami talks to him over the radio.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Can you hear me, Hayabusa? Our official objective to stopping the fleet… But I want you to make finding Canna your top priority. We still need to take care of the fleet, though. So you need to knock out their defenses at the same time. Can you handle that?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I can.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Your targets are the close-in weapons systems. There’s one on the forward deck. Destroy them. Then we’ll launch a bombardment. Once you knock out the defenses, board their flagship, the Black Narwhal.
[Ryu destroys the first weapon system.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: You’ve disabled the bow unit, but there are more. You need to knock out all the weapons systems before we can attack.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Understood. I’ll destroy everything.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Good luck.
[Ryu goes on, taking down the defense systems, until he sees that one of the ships launched three missiles.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: SMM launch detected! What’s the trajectory? …busa! Hayabusa!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I read you.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: I can’t believe they sacrificed their own ship. They’re desperate. I want to press the attack, but…
[Ishigami pauses for a few seconds.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Hayabusa, we can’t wait much longer! Get the hell out of there! They’re still putting up the fight! Get out of there!
[But Ryu continues and jumps on the Black Narwhal. On its desk he encounters way more powerful enemies – spider-robots.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: This is all-out war. Take out its legs to slow it down, just like before!
[Ryu defeats two spider-robots when hear familiar voice.]

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: I should have not expected nothing less from the destroyer of lives.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: There’s Canna? Leave her out of this.

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: How could a slave of convention and tradition understand? A blood-stained murderer at that!
[Ashtear uses his magic to drag in some metal parts and slowly transform himself into mechanical monster.]

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: All that remains, is to wait for the awakening… But simply waiting can be such a bore… Time to die, Dragon Ninja!
[The fight begins. After Ryu drains out Ashtear health he takes a brake, eat a jet and turns into a new flying form.]
[As Ryu drains out Ashtear health second time, his robot loses energy and fall down. Ryu slowly goes to Ashtear lying on the deck.]

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: Try as you might, this entire infernal world cannot stop us. Since ancient times, we Alchemists have studied the works of God. We worked on the fringes of society, disdaining simplistic social mores concerning, that is “right” or “wrong”.
[Ryu ruthlessly pierces him. Of the last forces Ashtear cries out his last words.]

Speaker: Ashtear
Text: May the unclean world be annihilated!
[The Black Narwhal begins to go underwater.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Hayabusa. You’re submerging. We won’t be able to communicate much longer.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Leave this to me. I’ll find her.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Thanks, Hayabusa.

[Ryu jumps into the hold of the Black Narwhal. Having made his way through several sections of the submarine, he finds Canna. She is placed in a capsule filled with some sort of solution and, apparently, unconscious. Ryu sees a Regent of the Mask with her.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What have you done?!

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: You’re late, Mr. Scary Ninja.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Let the girl go.

Speaker: Regent of the Mask
Text: This is the final act, Dragon Ninja. You’re always fated to end in tragedy!
[They fight. After defeating Regent of the Mask Ryu cuts his mask in half.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Is that…?
[Suddenly Canna wakes up.]

Speaker: Canna
Text: Daddy…?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: He’s your…?
[Clifford comes t the room clapping.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: A fine battle. A fine performance. Ah, Theodore, my brother. He was the ace up my sleeve.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Her father died in an accident…!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: My brother opposed my plan. He tried to stop it. That’s why I had him die in the “accident”.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: What do you mean?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: But there was another role for him to play: to die by your hand. So I brought him back to life. Of course, I didn’t need his memories so I erased them… The mask controlled him through an AI. That’s who you were talking to. My brother did love the opera so I wonder if he enjoyed being a dramatic persona?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You out of your mind!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Tsk, tsk. Look who’s talking. You killed my brother… Canna’s father! Isn’t that right, Canna?

Speaker: Canna
Text: Murderer!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Canna?!
[His hand begins to hurt wildly yet again and Ryu falls to his knees.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Ah, the curse is complete as well. You know, I was worries that you wouldn’t be able to bear the burden. But you did. A true Dragon Ninja. But it seems we’ve reached your limit.
[Ryu tries to attack Clifford, but he became so weak that even Clifford can dodge his attack. In return Clifford kicks Ryu.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: No no. It isn’t naptime quite yet. Come, ninja. Get up. I SAID, GET UP!
[Clifford puts his hand in Ryu’s chest and takes out the Dragon Sword from there.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: There it is. Behold the Dragon Sword, purified of sin and pollution, shining with original purity! It is a sword for a Goddess!
[He throws the Dragon Sword to the capsule with Canna.]

Speaker: Canna
Text: Why? Why did you kill my Daddy…? You… you MURDERER!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: C-Canna…!
[Canna cries and disappears.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: It is done. Seven days it shall take… Now, begin thy work, my Maker!

[The Dragon Sword falls into the capsule and then its is grabbed by some sort of demonic arm. The creature grows and grows until it splits the Black Narwhal in half. Ishigami sees this madness on his monitor.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: What the hell is that?!
[Several jets are flying to the creature.]

Speaker: Jet’s Pilot
Text: Eagle 1, Fox 2!

Speaker: Jet’s Pilot 2
Text: Eagle 4, Fox 2! Clear to go hot, weapons free!
[Jets is trying to shoot the creature with rockets - no effect. The creature wave his hand and jets are turning into crystals and falls down.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: …We’re too late.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: HAHAHA! That’s it, that’s it! You think your pathetic modern weapons can stop her?! Go, Canna! Go and create a new world!
[Canna creates herself legs and already wanted to leave, but turns around to the cry that comes from the drowning Narwhal.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Canna!
[The Narwhal drowns, taking Ryu and his defeated enemies with it.]

[Ryu is standing on the snowy ground, recalling the episode with Canna and how she called him "murderer." Next to Ryu is Genshin, who passes his sword to him. Ryu takes it and the sword lights up with a bright red glow. Then Ryu wakes up and sees Mizuki.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa?!
[Ryu writhes in agony and breathes heavily.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Where am I?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: We’re on a JSDF destroyer. In the infirmary.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You found me…?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: You were out there. Floating. Clinging to a piece of wreckage. You… Those wounds… I don’t know how you made it. But here you are…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You saved my life. Thank you.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I’m… um… I’m just glad you’re okay, Hayabusa.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Call me Ryu.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Okay… Ryu.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I… I couldn’t save her.
[We see the legs of Ishigami. He walks down the corridor.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: The man in the mask… He was Canna’s father.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Theodore…?! It can’t be…
[Ishigami approaches the room where Ryu and Mizuki talking and wants to knock, but stops and listens.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …Cliff brought him back from the dead. And cut him down… I killed Canna’s father right in front of her. She called me a murderer.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: No!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Canna… doesn’t know who she is anymore. She’s gone.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: That was Canna? Maybe she’s going to Japan… trying to find her way home.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …Then we’ll follow her.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: But, in your condition…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I made a promise. To protect you, and Canna.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Do you remember when Canna asked you to be her father?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Yeah.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: She said id we were a family… we would be all together. Her, me… and you.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Family… Let’s go. Let’s bring Canna home.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I’ll go tell the others.
[Ishigami enters the room.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Hey. The helicopter is ready. Time to go.
[Ishigami, Ryu and Mizuki fly away in the helicopter. As they fly we hear a news report.]

Speaker: Reporter
Text: The giant creature that suddenly landed on the shores of Japan continues to turn Tokyo into an ocean of flames… Sources indicate that the unknown military units that came ashore…

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Oh, Canna…
[The helicopter starts to shake.]

Speaker: Pilot
Text: I can’t get any closer. It’s too dangerous!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: This’ll do.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: You heard him. This is where you get off.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Okay. I’ll see you soon.
[Ryu jumps out of the helicopter and the game continues.]

Speaker: DAY 8
Text: TOKYO, JAPAN

[Ryu goes ahead, killing the soldiers. We see that Tokyo is almost completely destroyed. After a while, Ryu again falls into a bloody rage, and when it comes out of it, a group of new monsters attacks him. Ryu tries to fight, but he has almost no strength left. Fortunately, Joe and Momiji are here to help him.]

Speaker: Momiji
Text: Master Ryu, here.
[Momiji throws to Ryu The Eye of The Dragon.]

Speaker: Joe
Text: You’ve been burden with my sins, as well as you own.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Father…

Speaker: Joe
Text: Ryu! Go!
[Ryu goes further and climbs onto a large building, from where he sees the Goddess. Ishigami is talking to him over the radio.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Hurry, Hayabusa! We’ve set up your rendezvous point for Mizuki. It’s just past the Kabukicho Building to your north.
[After a while, Ryu finds Muramasa’s shop, which, like the whole area around, is destroyed. Ryu looks around.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Muramasa?

Speaker: Muramasa
Text: Ryu, tell me. What is that?
[Muramasa points at the Goddess.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: They called her… the Goddess.

Speaker: Muramasa
Text: But she bore the Dragon Sword… How? Only those with dragon blood in their veins can wield that blade.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …They took my blood. And the Dragon Sword.

Speaker: Muramasa
Text: She has terrible strength. But her souls is not pure evil. I’ve heard it said that the power of the Dragon Sword can only kill that which is truly evil. Even if you get your sword back, you may not be able to finish her.
[Mizuki drives up to them on an SUV.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: …But I must try nonetheless.

Speaker: Muramasa
Text: Because it is your duty as a Dragon Ninja?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Because I promise to a little girl.

Speaker: Muramasa
Text: Ooh! That’s a fine reason. Then you’d best get going. You must have faith in the Dragon Sword and yourself!
[Ryu sits in the SUV.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I have to get Canna back. She’s my daughter.
[Mizuki starts driving. After a while they run into soldiers.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I can’t believe these bastards…

Speaker: Soldier
Text: Aim for the vehicle! Take it out! Shoot the car!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I can’t shake them!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Focus on driving. I’ll handle them!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Got it!
[Ryu uses his bow to kill soldiers.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: No…!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Just drive. Go! Fast!

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: What are you doing?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …OK! I trust you, Ryu.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Hold on!
[Ryu takes Mizuki in his arms and jumps off the bridge. When Ryu lowers Mizuki to the ground, his arm starts to hurt again.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Your arm…!

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Ugh… Forget it. Keep going.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I’ve got you back! I think we’re in Shinjuku.
[Some monster attacks Ryu. Mizuki shoots it.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: We did it…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Thanks, Mizuki.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: No problem. Don’t push yourself too hard, Ryu.
[They go on. In a few seconds we hear the voice of Clifford.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Do you ever give up, murderer? Still, you thirst for blood , even in the state you’re in?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Cliff!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: See, I kept my promise to you, didn’t I? I’m taking good, good care of Canna.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Don’t play games! Cliff, surely you don’t mean…? Why? Why Canna…?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: You really had no clue, did you? It was supposed to be your sister, Saya. But then she ran off with my brother. She couldn’t bear to destroy the world with something so dear to her in it… And our plans for new world went to hell. But! Thanks to their marriage, a better, a more PURE specimen was born: Canna. I suppose you should know. The cells of the Goddess’ body… They came from your sister.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Saya?!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Isn’t it splendid? Your sister will be the Goddess of the new world! Ha ha ha… Whahahaha!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Cliff, you are insane!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Oh dear, oh dear… I will be Adam, and she, my Eve. The new Eden will be all ours. And you two will be dead.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You will be the one to die.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: In the state you’re in? I think not!
[Clifford takes off his glasses and turns into a four-arms monster.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Cliff?!

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Behold the new form of the mankind! The old flesh shall be exterminated!
