[The fierce battle begins. After several clashes, Clifford soars up into the sky and flies back, shooting at Ryu with a laser. Ryu tries to shoot him with his bow, but the arrow does not do Clifford any damage.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Do you remember who gave you that bow?
[Clifford waves his hand and the bow in Ryu’s hand disappears.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Hah hah hah hah! So what you will do now, you archaic hero? {although the voiceover is clearly said “primitive hero”.}
[Ryu defeats Clifford and tries to slash him with his sword, but Clifford pushes him away.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Hayabusa!

[Clifford wants to shoot at Ryu with a beam of energy and Mizuki shields him. The shot does not reach the target, but Ryu and Mizuki loses consciousness. Clifford goes to the heroes to finish what he started, but gets shot in the chest. Clifford jumps to his feet in fury, but someone jumps off the roof and slash him with a sword. The Regent of the Mask appears on the stage.]

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Theodore…?!

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Well, Cliff? It’s time you returned my daughter.

Speaker: Clifford
Text: No! You remember?
[Clifford tries to attack Theodore, but he pierces him with a sword.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Why, Cliff?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Y-you all like my brother… so much. You… and Canna, and Saya. Everyone. I-I just wanted to bask in that spotlight. To wear that mask and see the world through his eyes.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: …Did you love her? My sister?

Speaker: Clifford
Text: Hah… n-no… If you do nothing, the world will die… If you kill the Goddess, Canna will die. All things come to an end. Goodbye.
[Clifford falls to the ground and turns into ashes.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: I suppose we should do introductions.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: So you still alive.

Speaker: Theodore
Text: I am. More or less.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Theodore…

Speaker: Theodore
Text: It’s been a while, Mizuki.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I’ve got so many questions, so many things to ask…

Speaker: Theodore
Text: That can wait. First, we need to do something about those injures. We can’t have that pretty face spoiled by scars.

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I don’t have time for that!

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Wouldn’t you agree, Hayabusa?!

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: I’ll be right back.

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Let’s go, Hayabusa.
[Ryu and Theodore leaves. The game continues.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Sorry for all the trouble I caused you.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: Forget it.

Speaker: Theodore
Text: All right… Guess that’s a Dragon Ninja for you.
[They make their way together through destroyed Tokyo infested by monsters. Climbing to a tall building they continue the conversation.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: I fill like I’ve woken from a… a long, terrible nightmare.

Speaker: Ryu
Text: It’s good you’re awake again.

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Now we have to save Canna from her nightmare.
[The heroes goes on.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Such strength, even while cursed… I’m impressed. Let’s finish this!
[The heroes finds a massive force field.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Canna’s in there!
[Theodore trying to touch the field, but his arm is pushed away.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: …Hm. The field seems to have been cast with high-level Enochian magic. But this cannot go on…
[Theodore touches the field again, but now his arm is glowing. The field disappears.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Let’s go!
[Ryu goes ahead, pulling his sword from its scabbard. He turns around and sees that Theodore is gone. Then he feels that Theodore’s sword is touching his neck.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: That are you doing?

Speaker: Theodore
Text: Now that I’m here, I understand.
[Ryu beats off Theodore’s sword and they exchange a few blows, then stand up against each other.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: It’s just as Cliff said. We just can’t save Canna, not anymore! When she wakes, she will destroy the world. It is your fate to use that sword to cut down my daughter. To kill her. As her father… I cannot allow that to happen!
[The battle begins. When Ryu defeats Theodore and hits him with the final blow, he reads some spell.]

Speaker: Ryu
Text: The curse…?
[The Grip of Murder is disappears from Ryu’s arm.]

Speaker: Theodore
Text: D-damn… The Grip of Murder is such a pain in the ass to undo…

Speaker: Ryu
Text: You wanted this…

Speaker: Theodore
Text: It’s my… atonement. Now… For Canna… the rest is in your hands.

[Ryu takes off his mask and flicks off the blood from the blade. Theodore falls down and dies. It’s time for a decisive battle. Ryu walks slowly to the edge of the building, when suddenly a huge Dragon Sword appears and cuts the building in half. Ryu comes face to face with the Goddess. After a fierce battle at the limit of strength and skills, Ryu and the Goddess cross their swords. The huge Dragon Sword chopped the Sword of the Archfiend, but it also collapses, transforms into its usual size and falling into Ryu’s hands. Ryu takes the Eye of the Dragon out of his pocket and accidentally drops the paper shuriken gifted by Canna. The hero overfills with memories. Inserting the Eye of the Dragon into his sword Ryu jumps and chops the Goddess in half, trying not to hurt Canna, and then catches her.]

Speaker: Canna
Text: Daddy…?

[Ryu turns his head away, remembering that he already killed her father twice. The Goddess and all the monsters are turning into dust. Ryu looks up at the sky watching the dust blown away by the wind.]
[Some time passes. Tokyo is overrun by the military. We see Mizuki making her way through the crowd.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Canna!
[She sees Canna lying on the ground.]

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Oh, my Canna…! Oh, Canna!
[Ryu watches them from around the corner, smiles and leaves.]

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: Leaving already?

Speaker: Ryu
Text: I’ve done what I came to do.

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: You are not a murderer. You’re not exactly a hero either. I guess that’s what it means to be a ninja. But, you saved both of their lives, so… Thanks.
[Ryu nods and leaves. Meanwhile, Canna wakes up.]

Speaker: Canna
Text: M-mommy?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Canna! Oh, Canna…! It’s over, baby. Its all over now! Where’s Ryu…?

Speaker: Canna
Text: I… said some bad thinks to him. Is that why he left…?

Speaker: Ishigami
Text: He will always be with you, watching over you.

Speaker: Canna
Text: Really?

Speaker: Mizuki
Text: Ryu made a promise, didn’t he? He said he’d always protect you… and me, too. Forever and ever.
